bug.author: arturadib
bug.summary: Expander crops copy button from st.code()
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
st.code() normally has a button on the top right to enable quick pasteboard copying. When inside a beta_expander() block the button is gone. See image below. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/741528/100475116-467e6d00-30b0-11eb-9336-5a669c811746.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: streamlit-nightly==0.70.1.dev20201101 Python version: 3.7 OS version: Docker image python:3.7-buster Browser version: Chrome 86.0.4240.198

comments.comment: Could not repro with a three line example: <denchmark-link:https://share.streamlit.io/akrolsmir/streamlit-snippet/main?snippet_id=xrhQPFjm>https://share.streamlit.io/akrolsmir/streamlit-snippet/main?snippet_id=xrhQPFjm</denchmark-link>
looks like it got fixed somewhere between nightlies 0.70.1.dev20201101 and 0.71.1.dev20201129. feel free to close, thank you
